item.description: The victim’s sister has revealed her long road to recovery as the alleged attacker is identified.

item.title: Black Friday 2025: When is Black Friday and what Australian retailers will be included this year?
item.description: Get ready for the pre-Christmas trifecta of Click Frenzy, Black Friday and Cyber Monday.

item.title: Teachers reveal the best and worst end-of-year gifts: ‘Please, no more mugs!’
item.description: They’d much rather have this item over 25 candles and novelty mugs.

item.title: Aussie mums behind $99 bracelet that sold out a week after launching
item.description: ‘Love the quality and craftsmanship of these pieces! I never buy jewellery elsewhere anymore!’

item.title: Perth Wildcats import Mason Jones axed five games into NBL season
item.description: Just weeks into the new season, there are now three NBL clubs who have parted ways with star players.

item.title: Heartbreaking development as authorities end renewed search for missing outback boy Gus Lamont
item.description: August ‘Gus’ Lamont, 4, has not been seen since vanishing from his family’s farm at the end of September.

item.title: Australians warned of limited access to cash at businesses and banks after Transport Workers Union endorses major strike
item.description: The industrial action will see ‘major disruptions’ to those accessing cash.

item.title: Rising NRL star Sam Stephenson forced into medical retirement aged just 19
item.description: The teenager has shared a heartfelt message after his dream of following in his dad’s footsteps was dashed.

item.title: Melbourne Cup rocked as favourite Sir Delius ruled out by Racing Victoria vets
item.description: The Group 1 winner’s hopes of a historic double have been sensationally crushed.

item.title: Hayden Wright remembered for ‘heart of gold’ after death in Albany motorbike crash
item.description: The young father was only meant to be gone for 20 minutes. Tragically, he never made it home.

item.title: Christian Petracca hits back after ‘Brand Petracca’ criticism after Suns trade: ‘I love my job’
item.description: The Norm Smith medallist has spoken for the first time on his long-awaited trade out of Melbourne.

item.title: Farm worker filmed kicking and torturing animals successfully appeals sentence
item.description: Footage posted to social media shows him harming baby animals and trying to kill a kangaroo by running over its head with a dirt bikes.

item.title: Powerful Friday storm lashes Sydney and NSW coast, bringing hail, wind and heavy rain
item.description: A severe thunderstorm warning for large hailstones, damaging winds and heavy rainfall is still in place.

item.title: Carlton fans take aim at Charlie Curnow’s ‘cold’ nine-word farewell after Sydney Swans unveiling
item.description: Some supporters defended the forward, but the damage was done for most despite a second tribute.

item.title: North Melbourne captain Jy Simpkin bares soul in first statement on failed trade talks
item.description: ‘Over the past 24 months footy has taken a toll on my mental health, especially with losing two loved ones this year.’

item.title: One Nation leader Pauline Hanson targets Coalition MPs including Barnaby Joyce for One Nation defection
item.description: Aside from Barnaby Joyce, two Liberal heavyweights are also in Hanson’s sights.

item.title: Measles alert issued for Gold Coast school and bus routes after confirmed case
item.description: Parents are urged to stay vigilant as contact tracing continues and more students may have been exposed.

item.title: Australian cricket ‘devastated’ by death of former South Australian player Ben Cameron aged 44
item.description: The batsman has been remembered for his ‘significant’ contributions from his 2004 debut through to this year.

item.title: AFLW wrap: Port Adelaide’s shock upset opens up top-two race, Daisy Pearce’s Eagles on cusp of finals
item.description: The top eight is taking shape after two significant results on Friday night.

item.title: David Pye murder trial: Man accused of setting up Nick Martin assassination gets bail
item.description: The decision was made on the eve of the high-profile trial.

item.title: Brisbane businessman and former beauty pageant boss William Tan hit with 20 new child abuse charges
item.description: The court was told graphic details with police seizing phones and laptops from his two properties.

item.title: Aussie hero Travis Head goes into bat for Sam Konstas amid ‘brutal’ media coverage
item.description: ‘It would be nice if some people look after a 20-year-old kid a little bit more.’

item.title: Two women dead, third seriously injured in Bellingen crash in northern NSW
item.description: Bystanders performed CPR on two women until paramedics arrived.

item.title: New Aussie sprint sensation Uwezo Lubenda rivals Gout Gout after record-breaking 100m run
item.description: The 16-year-old obliterated the championship 100m record to put his name in the record books.

item.title: Ange Postecoglou launches remarkable five-minute monologue as pressure ramps up at Nottingham Forest
item.description: With his future seemingly in the balance, the Aussie manager reminded everyone how his story goes.

item.title: South East Queensland on alert as ‘right mix of ingredients’ could trigger severe storm outbreak
item.description: ‘The entire south-east is potentially in the firing line.’

item.title: Aussie states with the most bank branch and ATM closures revealed as government releases draft cash mandate plan
item.description: It comes as the government revealed its plan for the future of physical currency.

item.title: Quadriplegic dad giving back after strangers raised more than $420k following tragic accident
item.description: Andrew Regan couldn’t even shrug his shoulders after an incident at rugby left him a quadriplegic. Now he’s turning his attention to giving back.

item.title: Five Australia Post workers hospitalised after toxic pesticide leak in Townsville
item.description: The leakage from the package forced an emergency evacuation of the Queensland post office.

item.title: Racing recap: Ka Ying Rising wins the Everest, Jamie Melham creates history on Half Yours in Caulfield Cup
item.description: Recap all the action from Caulfield and Randwick.

item.title: How to watch Telethon: Channel Seven fundraiser to be broadcast live on 7plus for WA audiences and nationally on 7flix
item.description: Australia's biggest fundraising event is expanding its reach like never before.

item.title: New Aussie world champ Richelle Hill pays tribute to ‘incredible’ mum after spectacular victory in Wollongong
item.description: The 23-year-old produced a run for the ages to maker her Olympian mother proud.

item.title: Former Nationals leader Barnaby Joyce to leave party and not run for New England in next election, citing relationship breakdown
item.description: ‘My relationship with the leadership of the Nationals in Canberra has unfortunately, like a sadness in some marriages, irreparably broken down.’

item.title: Champion jockey Michelle Payne shares heartbreaking insight into sister Bernadette’s death
item.description: ‘I talk about it — without any answers — because maybe someone going through a similar thing will come up with an idea, a different path.’

item.title: Collingwood premiership hero Mason Cox announces his own delisting in emotional video
item.description: The 34-year-old thanked fans as he revealed his time at the club is over.

item.title: Truth comes out as Aussies falsely accused of mocking India’s refusal to shake hands in viral video
item.description: The video was deleted after sparking controversy across the cricket world.

item.title: New details emerge about Lauren Darul, woman accused of stabbing sushi chef Wan Lai in Melbourne CBD
item.description: More information is coming out about the woman accused of stabbing an innocent sushi chef as she walked to work.

item.title: The Voice hopeful Cassie Henderson reveals how Spice Girl Mel C helped her fight her inner demons
item.description: When the contestant confessed about her past experience, the popstar didn’t just listen, she could relate.

item.title: Champion jockey Zac Purton’s telling reaction to winning The Everest on Ka Ying Rising
item.description: The world’s best sprinter justified his standing despite not ‘being at his best’.

item.title: Liam Payne’s sisters mourn One Direction star a year on from his death at Buenos Aires Hotel
item.description: The One Direction star tragically died after plunging from his hotel balcony in Argentina last October.

item.title: Jamie Melham overcome with emotion after history-making Caulfield Cup win on Half Yours
item.description: The champion jockey couldn’t hold back tears after the biggest win of her career.

item.title: AFLW wrap: Roos make it 22 straight wins, Demons up to second place
item.description: The Kangaroos are a win away from equalling the most consecutive wins in VFL/AFL or AFLW history.

item.title: Australian coach Ange Postecoglou sacked after 39 days at Nottingham Forest
item.description: A terse statement has been issued not long after a wild press conference where the Australian made a staggering claim.

item.title: McLaren teammates Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri collide with each other on first lap of US Grand Prix sprint race
item.description: ‘That was terrible.’
